poem:
**A Year in Review**

The candles snuffed before their time,  
beneath the wheeze of crumpled scripts—  
vision veils in the morning mist,  
amber light posturing on cobblestones.  
His foot falls on tarnished promises,  
echoes soft as faded dreams—  
a year in shadows, whispers, and drafts,  
scribbling at the margins of change.
